title: Rapid design of LCC current-output resonant converters with reduced electrical stresses
abstract:
A straightforward design methodology for realising LCC current output\ud
resonant converters, with the aim of reducing tank currents,\ud
and hence, electrical stresses on resonant components, is presented\ud
and validated. The scheme is ideally suited for inclusion in a rapid\ud
iterative design environment, e.g. as part of a graphical user interface
